title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - Location, Location, Location: Liberatory Pedagogy in a University Classroom
description: Author Dr. Heather M. Dalamge discusses her article, co-authored with Samantha A. Martinez, "Location, Location, Location: Liberatory Pedagogy in a University Classroom," published in the January 2020 issue of Sociology of Race and Ethnicity.
